item.description:
Attention College Football Fans! & those who just want to party!

Ohio State @ Wisconsin 8:00 PM ABC, ESPN or ESPN2
Illinois @ Michigan 3:30 PM ABC
Stanford @ Notre Dame 2:30 PM NBC
Ohio @ Western Michigan 2:00 PM
Indiana @ Minnesota TBA
Kansas @ Iowa State TBA


Who: The Boston Ex-Midwesterners Meetup Group
What: College Football Frenzy
When: Oct 4 (Saturday) 7 PM or anytime after
Where: Game On! Fenway (82 Lansdowne St, Boston)
Why: Cheer on your favorite college football team and/or hangout with some fun ex-midwesterners


This is a joint event with the College Football MeetUp Group .
Also, Game On! attracts a large Ohio State, Wisconsin, and Kansas alumni crowd.

Game On! is a 12,000 square foot facility with state of the art technology, over 70 high definition televisions, and quality surround sound. Two floors of entertainment, great drinks and food. Voted Best of Boston 2005, 2006, and 2007.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign or call/text Jill at (617) 458-1221.
item.name: College Football Frenzy
